Keywords: Cosmic , Council of Kangs , Deity , Future , Past , Ruler
Real Name: Nathaniel Richards
Special Powers
I KNOW YOUR PAST AND YOUR FUTURE: At the beginning of your turn, if there is no d6 on this card, roll a d6 and place it on this card. // When a character within range rolls an attack roll, you may remove the d6 from this card and replace a die in the roll with it.
YOU UNDERESTIMATE ME, YET AGAIN: Once per turn, when an opposing character within range and line of fire attacks, before the attack roll is made you may guess if the attack will hit at least one target or if it will miss all targets. If you do, that attack roll can't be rerolled and, after resolutions, gain 2 MISSION POINTS if you chose correctly.

November 9, 2022
machineman
My favorite Immortus to date. I like the fun he seems to bring with the guessing game. And die replacers are good game changers sometimes. Especially when you couple his guessing game with his die replacement trick to make some guy miss and you get some points for it. Triple incap is always useful. I like his long range for it as well. I guess if he had some improved targeting he would cost more than your incapping support guy should, but for the outwit alone, I would have dug it. At least for the die replacement there’s only a range restriction.
